{"step_by_step_thinking": "The maxillary first molar normally has three roots according to Document [8] and Document [13]. Document [13] also mentions that the mesiobuccal root usually contains two canals, the distobuccal root usually contains a single canal, and the palatal root normally contains only a single canal. So, in total, the maxillary first molar has three roots and four canals.", "answer_choice": "B"}
